official_title: A Single Dose FMT Infusion From a Healthy Family Donor Via Colonoscopy as an Adjunct to Keytruda for the Benefit of Improving Efficacy of Immunotherapy for Metastatic Mesothelioma
inclusion_criteria:
* Patient with metastatic mesothelioma deemed a candidate for PD-1 blockade inhibitor therapy
Healthy volunteers allowed
exclusion_criteria:
* Patient unable/unwilling to comply with protocol
* Patient deemed not a candidate for PD-1 Blockade inhibitor therapy
